tossup_question: -  13)  – 	Which of the following tissues would contain a chondrocyte?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W)Hyaline cartilage
X)Areolar connective tissue
Y)Pseudostratified ciliated columnar epithelium
Z)Compact bone
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following traits does NOT make Eukarya distinct from Archaea and Bacteria?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W)Presence of a nucleosome structure
X)Presence of 80S rather than 70S ribosomes
Y)Meiotic [my-oh-tic] chromosome segregation
Z)Use of methionine [meth-eye-oh-neen] as initiator tRNA
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Z) USE OF METHIONINE AS INITIATOR tRNA
